about_the_game:
This game has no text and can be played in any language!
There are no repeating annoying sprites in the game!

You get into the building of a space elevator, which is designed to lift cargo to the orbit of the planet, but it turns out that the elevator is broken and you have to go upstairs on foot, it will be an unforgettable Cyber Trip.
The space around sometimes defies earthly logic, everything around floats and the clear contours of the location can be distorted, hiding the passage. This is definitely not the physics of the world you are familiar with. But you must by all means pass through parallel spaces and restore the functionality of the technology called "CyberSkyscrUpper"

You will need to go through 30 levels filled with bonuses and enemies, solving various puzzles to find the necessary locations:

.

An example of gameplay can be seen here:

.

name: CyberSkyscrUpper

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720 minimum resolution, recommended dedicated graphics card with 2GB of RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game may be CPU intensive on older hardware!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
